Dear Sirs,

Sub: Our Purchase order No. BP/807/2024-25 dated 27/12/2024.

We hereby amend the subject order to the extent indicated below:

Rest of the entries remain unaltered.

This is issued without prejudice to the terms and conditions of the order.

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,

BrahMos Aerospace Thiruvananthapuram Ltd.
